To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Breakaway _breakaway;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_breakaway = Breakaway(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_breakaway.IsReady)
{
    var current = _breakaway.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.breakaway = self.Breakaway(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.breakaway.IsReady:
    current = self.breakaway.Current.Value
